derived_views_policy: Derived views: T1_agency_sources / T2_preprint_sources / T3_press_sources are convenience lists that MUST be a subset of the canonical keyed registry. They MUST NOT redefine fields (tier/confidence/urls). Authoritative metadata lives only in the per-source registry entries.
description: Source registry upgraded under BordneAI Phase-10 protocols â€” includes EOS Transparency Layer, provenance tiers, and confidence scaling.

negative_null_policy.description: Do not treat non-detections or 'no evidence found' statements as positive proofs of absence. Model them as observational limits tied to instrument sensitivity and campaign coverage.
examples: No radio signal detected above instrument noise floor.
No confirmed satellites or swarm objects resolved in current imaging.
